message.default: リクエストが不正です。
削除対象のデータがありません。
リソースが存在しません。
リソースが競合しました。
システム管理者に連絡して下さい。

seasonNumber.description: Season number (set value is 1 or 2 or 3)

gradeShape.description: Information about the shape of the grade

color.description: Color of the shape in hexadecimal format

x.description: X-coordinate of the center of the circle

y.description: Y-coordinate of the center of the circle

textColor.description: Color of the text associated with the shape in hexadecimal format

points.description: List of points defining the shape

previewImage.description: Image path for arena perspective from grade

dailySeatId.description: Daily seat ID. Required if ticketType is daily.

beforeDailySeatId.description: Daily seat ID. Required if ticketType is daily and orderType is upgrade.

afterDailySeatId.description: Daily seat ID. Required if ticketType is daily and orderType is upgrade.

eventCode.description: Event code. Required if ticketType is daily.

seasonSeatId.description: Season seat ID. Required if ticketType is season.

dailySeatId.description: Daily seat ID. Required if ticketType is daily.

eventCode.description: Event code. Required if ticketType is daily.

status.description: Status of SBpayment (e.g., OK, NG, PY)

get.summary: Get all temporary daily seats in cart
